materials.name: JNU-1

synthesis_conditions.notes: Synthesized according to the reported procedure
Sample was activated without any prior solvent exchange

materials.additional_information: JNU-1 is stable in water over a pH range of 2 to 12 and thermally stable up to 450 88C in a N2 atmosphere. It has a BET surface area of 818 m2 g@1.

materials.name: C2H2@JNU-1

synthesis_conditions.notes: Desolvated JNU-1 crystals were put in a C2H2 atmosphere
SCXRD data were collected after preloading with C2H2

materials.additional_information: C2H2 molecules were found to simultaneously bond to two open ZnII centers.
